description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Break out of prison and fight against the growing tide of the undead. A story-driven survival horror game with elements of role-playing, squad control and combat.
description.short: Break out of prison and fight against the growing tide of the undead. A story-driven survival horror game with elements of role-playing, squad control and combat.
